content: प्रतिकर्मन् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Requital, retaliation. {@--2@} Redress, remedy, counteraction. {@--3@} Personal decoration, dress, toilet; (अबलाः) प्रतिकर्म कर्तुमुपचक्रमिरे समये हि सर्वमुपकारि कृतं <ls>Śi. 9. 43</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">5. 27</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Opposition, hostility.
